content.rendered:
Home

JEWELLERY SAFE STORAGE

Keeping your precious jewellery safe in United States is a constant concern.

Imagine the peace of mind of knowing your cherished heirlooms and

sparkling gems are protected from burglary, fire, and unforeseen events.

Book a Tour

Unmatched Security & Unwavering Trust

Fortis Vault, Manhattan’s leading high-security storage facility, offers unparalleled safety for your treasured jewellery with our state-of-the-art deposit box solutions.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX FOR YOUR JEWELLERY STORAGE

Fortis Vault’s safety deposit boxes provide the ultimate peace of mind for your treasured jewellery. Here’s how:

  • Unmatched Security: Our deposit boxes are housed within a bank-grade vault, protected by advanced security measures, including 24/7 surveillance, alarm systems, and restricted access protocols.
  • Variety of Secure Sizes: We offer a range of deposit box sizes to perfectly accommodate your jewellery collection, from delicate earrings to precious necklaces and larger family heirlooms.
  • Privacy & Discretion: Only you and your authorised designees can access your deposit box. The contents remain completely confidential.
  • Convenient Access: Access your safety deposit box during our extended business hours for added convenience, ensuring your valuables are readily available when needed.

SECURITY IS OUR TOP PRIORITY

At Integrated Vaults, security is paramount. We are committed to providing an impenetrable environment for your valuables. Here’s why:

  • Unwavering Staff Training: Our highly trained personnel undergo rigorous security protocols and background checks.
  • Advanced Security Technology: We utilise the latest advancements in access control, surveillance, and vault construction to deter and prevent any unauthorised access.
  • 24/7 Monitoring: Our facilities are under constant vigilance, ensuring your valuables are protected around the clock.

We also offer our secure storage service for gold bullion documents, coins and banknotes jewellery and other valuables.

 

SECURE A SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX

WHY CHOOSE At Integrated Vaults?

SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SERVICE

 

Our professional staff is dedicated to providing you with exceptional service and support.

NO ACCESS FEES

Pay only for your safety deposit box size.

NO HIDDEN FEES

We offer complete transparency in our pricing.

STATE-OF-THE-ART SECURITY TECHNOLOGY

 

We utilise the latest security advancements to protect your valuables.

FLEXIBLE ACCESS OPTIONS

 

Choose the access plan that best suits your needs through convenient scheduling.

PRIVATE VIEWING ROOMS

 

Discreetly review your belongings in a dedicated, secure space.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking an appointment to access your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process:

  1. Find At Integrated Vaults: Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible.
  2. Select a storage size: We have four box sizes available, so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.
  3. Automate your payments: We offer a convenient auto-pay system to avoid late fees and ensure uninterrupted access to your valuables.

OTHER SOLUTIONS OFFERED

At Integrated Vaults cater to a wide range of valuables

SMSF Storage


We understand the importance of trusting your SMSF gold storage. That’s why we offer state-of-the-art safe deposit boxes designed to provide unparalleled peace of mind.

Gold Bullion

 

Your valuables deserve the utmost security. At Integrated Vaults, we understand the importance of protecting your precious metals and other assets. That’s why we offer a range of secure deposit box solutions to provide unparalleled peace of mind.

Important Documents

 

Irreplaceable documents like wills, passports, birth certificates, and property deeds hold immense importance. At Integrated Vaults provides a safe and reliable solution for storing these critical documents.

Currency

 

Cash or foreign currency can be a security risk when kept at home or in a traditional safe. At Integrated Vaults offers a secure and discreet solution for storing your currency. Our access-controlled vaults ensure that only authorised individuals can access your valuables.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

What security features does At Integrated Vaults offer for storing high-value jewellery in safety deposit boxes?

At Integrated Vaults utilises a multi-layered approach to security, including:

High-definition surveillance: Our facilities are monitored by state-of-the-art camera systems with recording capabilities.

Are there any restrictions on the types or quantities of jewellery that can be stored in At Integrated Vaults’ safety deposit boxes?
Other than prohibited items, all jewellery items can be stored At Integrated Vaults.. Please see our rental agreement or contact our customer service team for a comprehensive list of acceptable and prohibited items. We can also advise you on proper jewellery storage practices within your safety deposit box.
Can clients access their jewellery stored in At Integrated Vaults’ safety deposit boxes at any time?
At Integrated Vaults offers extended business hours to ensure convenient access to your valuables.. In addition to our standard operating hours, we are open on the first and third Saturday of every month. Bookings are essential.
Does At Integrated Vaults provide insurance coverage for jewellery stored in their safety deposit boxes?
At Integrated Vaults offers a third-party basic insurance coverage for the contents of your safety deposit box. The specific coverage limits are outlined in the rental agreement. We highly recommend acquiring additional jewellery insurance to ensure your valuables are fully protected based on their appraised value. Our professional team can help you in understanding your insurance options.
Does At Integrated Vaults ensure discretion and confidentiality for clients storing jewellery in safety deposit boxes?
At Integrated Vaults, we prioritise client privacy. We maintain strict confidentiality regarding the contents of your safety deposit box. Your personal information and the details of your stored valuables are never shared without your explicit consent.
Does At Integrated Vaults offer additional services for clients storing jewellery, such as appraisal, cleaning, or maintenance?
While At Integrated Vaults does not directly offer jewellery appraisal, cleaning, or maintenance services, we can provide you with a network of trusted professionals who specialise in these areas. We understand the importance of caring for your precious possessions and can connect you with reputable service providers.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking an appointment to access your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process:

01. Find At Integrated Vaults

Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible

Find now

02. Select a storage size

We have four box sizes available so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.

View Storage Sizes

03. Automate your payments

We offer a convenient auto-pay system to avoid late fees and ensure uninterrupted access to your valuables.

Start Now

CONTACT US TODAY!

Ready to secure your peace of mind? Contact At Integrated Vaults today to learn more about our secure valuables or gold bullion storage solutions or to schedule a visit to our facility.

Phone:

(646) 338 4170
(9am – 5pm AEST)

 

Fax:

(03) 9654 8167

 

Mailing Address:

800 Third Avenue
Midtown Manhattan, New York 10022

 

Email Us:

info@integratedvaults.com

 

OUR VAULT LOCATION

Level 10, 227 Collins Street (Wales Corner Building)
Manhattan, Victoria
United States
